title: Hold onto the Precious Gifts from Srila Prabhupada @madhupanditdasaofficial
speaker: HDG Srila Prabhupada

segments.text: So you need to contemplate, what is this becoming liberated?
Constant transmigration of the soul from one body to another is the cause of suffering in material existence.
A spiritual master is liberating me from this.
You do any kind of gratitude, it is not enough.
You do any kind of glorification of spiritual master, that is still not enough for what he has done to you.
What he has done is to liberate us from this material energy.
Actually, we are already liberated.
We are already liberated.
Only thing, we are not permanently liberated.
Irrevocably, we have to get liberated.
If you live in the Krishna consciousness movement, you chant 16 rounds, you follow everything that Prabhupada says,
already you are liberated.
We are all liberated.
But tomorrow, if you don't chant, you will get bonded.
You can call it as a day-to-day liberation program we have.
Day-to-day liberated we are.
It is a fact.
Because it's our karma, our all those things like a, like a dam.
A dam holds the water that is behind, isn't it?
Now here, we are all having a dam built across us.
Across Gunakala and Kurukshetra.
A dam is built.
Okay, if the dam is built, then no water will come this side at all.
Isn't it?
Then how I am living?
How my body is functioning?
My karma is not acting upon me.
No, there are sluice gates in the dam.
In the dam, controlled manner, water is sent out.
Is it not?
Similarly, once you take initiation from purification,
your devotee, he builds a dam across your karma and he plays with your, he and the chaiti guru,
they play with the sluice gates.
How much water should come out?
That is doubt-tailing.
They guide you how to doubt-tail your entire attachments and everything, how to doubt-tail it.
So there is a control.
That way, we are liberated.
From the material energy.
The moment you give up the spiritual master, the moment you offend the spiritual master,
the moment we don't, the degree to which we don't follow the spiritual master,
when we don't follow the spiritual master, when we don't follow the four regulatory principles,
what we are doing is, you know, Prabhupada is building a dam and we are constantly trying to tear down the dam.
Opposite of what Prabhupada is doing,
he is building a dam.
Prabhupada is saying, I am protecting you.
I said, no, I want to tear it down.
I want to tear down the protection.
And then, once, twice, thrice, Prabhupada will watch.
Again, he will build back.
More, so merciful.
You have fallen, again, he will build you back.
Build back the dam again, immediately.
Give you some more realization, give you some more knowledge,
and try to, again and again, increase your transcendental knowledge.
Try to detach you, person to person, situation to situation, Paramatmas,
the super soul is actually trying to to to enlighten the living entity but if
you go on like that then one day damn will be open okay become a karma you
don't want this you don't you don't you don't deserve to be liberated so it's a
liberated life so whatever we do that constant downpour of water from the
cloud the cloud is compared to the mercy of the spiritual master where the
grace of the spiritual master the cloud of mercy of the personality Godhead is
brought in then only when the rains of Krishna consciousness fall the rain of
Krishna consciousness has fallen on all of us
